verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Nehiloth <WH5155>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. Give ear <WH238> <WH8685> to my words <WH561>, O YY <WH3068>, consider <WH995> <WH8798> my meditation <WH1901>.
Hearken <WH7181> <WH8685> unto the voice <WH6963> of my cry <WH7773>, my King <WH4428>, and my 'Elohim <WH430>: for unto thee will I pray <WH6419> <WH8691>.

My voice <WH6963> shalt thou hear <WH8085> <WH8799> in the morning <WH1242>, O YY <WH3068>; in the morning <WH1242> will I direct <WH6186> <WH8799> my prayer unto thee, and will look up <WH6822> <WH8762>.
For thou art not a 'Elohim <WH410> that hath pleasure <WH2655> in wickedness <WH7562>: neither shall evil <WH7451> dwell <WH1481> <WH8799> with thee.
The foolish <WH1984> <WH8802> shall not stand <WH3320> <WH8691> in thy sight <WH5869>: thou hatest <WH8130> <WH8804> all workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205>.
Thou shalt destroy <WH6> <WH8762> them that speak <WH1696> <WH8802> leasing <WH3577>: the YY <WH3068> will abhor <WH8581> <WH8762> the bloody <WH1818> and deceitful <WH4820> man <WH376>.

But as for me, I will come <WH935> <WH8799> into thy house <WH1004> in the multitude <WH7230> of thy mercy <WH2617>: and in thy fear <WH3374> will I worship <WH7812> <WH8691> toward thy holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>.
Lead <WH5148> <WH8798> me, O YY <WH3068>, in thy righteousness <WH6666> because of mine enemies <WH8324> <WH8802>; make thy way <WH1870> straight <WH3474> <WH8685> before my face <WH6440>.

For there is no faithfulness <WH3559> <WH8737> in their mouth <WH6310>; their inward <WH7130> part is very wickedness <WH1942>; their throat <WH1627> is an open <WH6605> <WH8803> sepulchre <WH6913>; they flatter <WH2505> <WH8686> with their tongue <WH3956>.

Destroy <WH816> <WH8685> thou them, O 'Elohim <WH430>; let them fall <WH5307> <WH8799> by their own counsels <WH4156>; cast them out <WH5080> <WH8685> in the multitude <WH7230> of their transgressions <WH6588>; for they have rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804> against thee.

But let all those that put their trust <WH2620> <WH8802> in thee rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>: let them ever <WH5769> shout for joy <WH7442> <WH8762>, because thou defendest <WH5526> <WH8686> them: let them also that love <WH157> <WH8802> thy name <WH8034> be joyful <WH5970> <WH8799> in thee.
For thou, YY <WH3068>, wilt bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the righteous <WH6662>; with favour <WH7522> wilt thou compass <WH5849> <WH8799> him as with a shield <WH6793>.
